question: Syed Ata Hasnain, Rajendra Singh and Krishna Vatsa are recently appointed as the members of which Indian organisation?
explanation:
Retired Army General and former Military Secretary-Lt Gen Syed Ata Hasnain, Former Director General of the Coast Guard-Rajendra Singh and United Nations Development Programmeâ€™s Policy advisor in Disaster reduction-Krishna Vatsa are the three members recently appointed as the members of the National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA).
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is the Chairman of NDMA. Kamal Kishore, who is serving as member of NDMA, has been provided a fresh term of five years.
